description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.The delivery is requested to 25 CFSD Montreal and 7 CFSD Edmonton by December 2023.
full_summary:
### Regulator, Oxygen, Diluter Demand Procurement Request
#### Request for Proposal RFP ID: W8485-247875/A

This procurement request is for Regulator, Oxygen, Diluter Demand, a crucial component for the Canadian Armed Forces. The Centre de Parachutes et de Manœuvres aériennes (CPMA) and other training centers require this equipment to meet operational requirements.

#### Procurement Details:

*   **RFP ID:** W8485-247875/A
*   **Public Notice Date:** 2023-10-31
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-10T14:00:00
*   **Contract Start Date:** 2023-11-30
*   **Contract End Date:** 2024-03-29

#### Description and Requirements:
The procurement request is for two types of Regulator, Oxygen, Diluter Demand items, specified below:

*   **Item 1:** Regulator, Oxygen, Diluter Demand ( Quantité: 75, Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to 25 CPMA Montreal)
    *   NSN: 1660-01-407-8855
    *   Part No.: B40550-1
    *   NCAGE: 04577
*   **Item 2:** Regulator, Oxygen, Diluter Demand (Quantité: 75, Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to 7 DADA Edmonton)
    *   NSN: 1660-01-407-8855
    *   Part No.: B40550-1
    *   NCAGE: 04577

#### Special Requirements:

*   The items should be in overhauled in new condition or acceptable.
*   Regulators must have the Guard P/N 19497 installed.
*   Bidders are required to indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAGE, if equivalent or substitute products are proposed.

#### Documents:

*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
*   The attached documents are available at the links below
    *   [ Bid Solicitation Document English ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23667/w8485-247875a---bid-solicitation-en1.1.pdf)
    *   [ Bid Solicitation Document French ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca
